artist: Engraver: Wenceslaus Hollar; Painter: After Johannes Van Balen; Printer: Jan Meyssens
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [40 JOHANNES VAN BALEN/ Bonpainetre en petite et en grand, il a este quelque temps en/ Italie, a pris son Commencenemt apres son Pere Henderic van/ Balen, Il fut ne'en Anuens Jan 1611 ou il çe lientementinant, / Johannes Van Balen pinxit, W. Hellar fecit, IMeyssens excudit   1-71(in pencil)]
life_date: Wenceslaus Hollar, Engraver, Bohemian (active in London and Antwerp), 1607–1677; After Johannes Van Balen, Painter, Dutch; Jan Meyssens, Printer, Dutch, 1612–1670
title: Portrait of Johannes Van Balen
